title: Flex and Solo/DuoQ
body:
Could someone please explain to me the difference between flex queue and soloQ/duoQ in the preseason? i understand that if you obtain a higher rank in flex than your usual rank, it will be reconsidered upon the season reset, but is this the same for solo/duoQ?

And hence, which should i be queuing up for, flex Q or soloQ (i am a solo player but it hasnt been mentioned by riot if your new soloQ rank will be reconsidered upon reset) 

thanks x

replies.body: I still dont understand why with our low pop we have modes for queing as a 2....  make it SoloQ   or 2/3/5 man flex queue.

both ques will be reset. both ques are now independent of each other. You could be diamond solo/duo but silver flex if you don't play on it.

What you should play is up to you. Riot are using preseason to see how popular and how well each que runs and whether OCE is big enough to have simultaneous ranked ques.

I personally will mainly play solo/duo as my "main" ranked and Flex will be when im playing with friends.
There will be another minor MMR reset at the start of the season for both queues. So any games you play in the preseason in either queue will affect your 2017 Season starting rank in that queue.
